Articles.Content: 1786: Long corridor with two creepy girls at the end of it. You swiftly know what's happening and go to floor 1787.
1787: come play with us danny
1788: Memeworld. Only the dankest of memes can live here, and you are not at that level of swag to even walk into the hallway. You decide to go to the 1789th floor.
1789: Dead memeworld- full of all of the pepes, dat bois, harambes, doges, y u nos, and (dead in more ways than one) gabe the dogs, and any other memes that haven't stood the test of time

Wow, 1789 is Valhalla for memes.

1790: You stare into the void, and the void stares back at you.

 

EDIT: This tower is (surprisingly) only ~5.4km. good to know. That is, using standard 10ft/per story.

Edited June 12, 2017 by Astrofox

woah that's tiny

Floor 1791: you find the entire universe, compressed into the size of a small bouncing ball, being played with by a cat. The cat whacks the ball, and you feel the universe shift around you, before the whole thing starts to roll. Once it stops, you get up, and continue upwards

1792:  You stand between two mirrors. Your reflection smiles, so you smile. Your reflection moves its hand, so you move yours. It takes a very long while for you to realise that this is the wrong way round.

1793: You open the door, and find yourself on floor 1741. You look around, and realize that this isn't a replica of floor 1741, it is floor 1741. You turn around, and try to walk towards the door, but every step you take towards it, it gets farther away.

92 years later

You eventually reach the door. Finally. You hurry up the stairs, and enter floor 1793 again, only to find yourself in the middle of floor 1741 once more.

7 billion years later

It appears you aren't aging. That's one bonus. Every time you enter the room, you start further and further away from the door. The walk to the door this time has taken 3 million years. Finally, you get out. This time, you decide to skip floor 1793.

floor 1794:

GUESS WHO...Kristina pimenova
1795: You come to a hallway with a room. In that room, there is a convention (your crazy pick). However, you decide to head to the 1796th floor.

1796: You find astrofox

Edited June 13, 2017 by Kosmonaut

Oh! Hi.

1797: You stumble onto this forum page. Yes, you are reading this post. Head to the next floor.

1798

something happens

1799: It is a recap of the highlights of the previous 100 floors. You feel a wave of nostalgia wash over you. That is, until you see 1793,, and have to watch 7 billion years of yourself walking towards a door.

1800: Walls are covered with graffiti describing what would everybody wish to see on the floor 1800.

For example:
1801st floor: You see no more staircases, you think you are already there. But as you keep walking and see a separate floor.

1802: You see on the opposite wall, writing smeared on the wall, in what suspiciously looks like blood. You can just make out what it says, as it is messy:

it will never stop

run

You all of the sudden feel as if there is something behind you. You turn around, and there is nothing there. But you feel the same thing. No matter which direction you turn, there is always something behind you.

You quickly move on to the next floor

Yes, those two graffities were indeed such long.

So, as we are still on floor 1800, let's open that fire door near the neon sign and get two floors up, as we don't want to check, what's on 1801 and 1802 in fact.

So, we are now on the floor 1803. Some weird cries sound from beneath, and we understand that those graffities were a trap.
Floor 1804: you find a tiny star held in the middle of the room. It takes you a moment to realize that this is probably powering the whole building.

Floor 1805: you find a sign that says "end" you ignore it and it's a false stair, you fall off the building and climb back up you go up the second set of stairs it leads to floor 1 HOW because it's actually floor +1 (floor 1806)
All windows are closed here., so you have to skip 1806 and climb up to 1807. Once you touch a window, you and window fall inside.

You realize you just fell out of the building, and climb all the way up the stairs to floor 1808, which shows models of all the missing floors, at least you hope they're models.

Edited June 15, 2017 by 53miner53
1809: One dude making an infinite supply of Kompot, vodka, and pancakes on this floor.

1810: your fears are confirmed the models you seen werent models theye where real you\ open a door your on floor 1741 again you get back the floor has changed you open the door your on floor 1742 again  you get back the floor has changed you open the door your on floor 1742 again  you get back the floor has changed you open the door your on floor 1742 again  you get back the floor has changed you open the door your on floor 1742 again  you get back the floor has changed you open the door your on floor 1742 again  you get back the floor has changed you open the door your on floor 1742 again  you get back the floor has changed you open the door your on floor 1742 again  you get back the floor has changed you open the door your on floor 1742 again  you get back the floor has changed you open the door your on floor 1742 again  you get back the floor has changed you open the door your on floor 1742 again  you get back the floor has changed you open the door your on floor 1742 again  you get back the floor has changed you open the door your on floor 1742 again  you get back the floor has changed you open the door your on floor 1742 again  you get back the floor has changed you open the door your on floor 1742 again  you get back the floor has changed you open the door your on floor 1742 again  you get back the floor has changed you open the door your on floor 1742 again  you get back the floor has changed you open the door your on floor 1742 again  you get back the floor has changed you open the door your on floor 1742 again (Coundlnt be botherd to change the #'s (that is a number, not a hashtag...)) you then go to the door you open it its a picture of a girl... 

you studder, she says "HEY, why you inturupt me" you close the door annd open the second one its floor 1811 you scream FINALY then the girl chases after you (she will for ever)

EDIT: you open 1811's door you feel somthing grate you
